title: What's news in v2.41.0
content:
Features:
  - Move tool can work with multiple frames at once
  - Show/hide the pixel grid from the joystick and gesture pad
  - Enable/disable canvas rotation from the joystick and gesture pad

Enhancements:
  - Non-reset-after tools in the joystick will switch to the previous tool if applied again

Fixes:
  - Content flipping on the same axis cannot be done repeatedly
  - Content flip and clear not being undoable
  - Minor UI issue with expanded-width timeline panel
